au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=4m_central_apx2p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: import time # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(3200,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g7 driveGuide(guideConfig.g7) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g7) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 2.5 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.28085) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.3914)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(30, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(30, 0) driveBsz(260)
